Class FinishedCardEffectResponse

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.network.response.Response
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.network.response.adventure.FinishedCardEffectResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class FinishedCardEffectResponse extends Response
Represents a response that indicates the completion of a card effect during the gameplay. This could signify the end of processing for a specific event or effect triggered by a card action within the game. This class extends the Response class and provides additional contextual information regarding whether the triggering of the response corresponds to the first occurrence of the effect. The FinishedCardEffectResponse is processed by invoking the handleFinishedEffectResponse method on a provided Handler instance, to manage the resulting actions or state updates.

  • Method Details

    • isFirst

      public boolean isFirst()
      Determines whether the effect being finalized is the first occurrence.
      Returns:
      true if this response corresponds to the first occurrence of finishing a card effect; false otherwise.

    • execute

      public void execute(Handler handler)
      Executes the logic associated with processing a finished card effect response by delegating the operation to the provided Handler instance. Specifically, it invokes the handleFinishedEffectResponse method on the given Handler.
      Specified by:
      execute in class Response
      Parameters:
      handler - The Handler instance responsible for processing this response. The method handleFinishedEffectResponse of this handler will be called to handle the response logic.
